text: well I'm both hopeful and pessimistic um
I'm pessimistic when I watch television
or or watch um a lot of the the stuff
that reflects culture because I do see a
deterioration of some of the values that
um I think Americans have been known for
but I also see a Resurgence of Hope in
that I see churches coming to the table
and saying um it's not enough for us to
just talk about The Souls of people we
also need to talk about their bodies
when I see churches that are are coming
to the table and saying let's not just
talk about people's salvation but let's
talk about the fact that the people that
we're trying to bring Salvation to also
are hungry they aren't wearing any
clothes they don't have a way to make a
living they're sick they have HIV they
don't have access to good water they
don't have access to good Healthcare
when I see them marriage of those two
ideas together caring for the body and
the soul and a lot of churches realizing
that's our responsibility to me that
gives me a lot of hope it seems like
that people are less interested I think
they're more interested in spiritual
things I think there are a lot of people
that would call themselves spiritual but
that could include all different types
of of viewpoints that's not the same as
um saying people are in relationship
with God um so I think they're becoming
less religious and maybe more spiritual
and I don't know necessarily see that as
a good thing
